title: Bug Splat with new alpha client and dark star mode!
body: Hello guys, yesterday 4.5.2017 riot add alpha client for all users in LoL and  added new game mode:Dark Star , and now when i find game on Dark Star i can't start playing and there is a f******g crash  and now i cant try  this new mode... could someone help me ? (sorry for my english :P :)

replies.body:
I had the same situation. I can't reconnect no matter what.
For information, I did the client update in the 7.9
I have the same situation right now, whenever i started the game mode, it's automatically shut me out. Can't reconnect no matter what. Please help!

The update may not have installed properly and resulted in some bad game files for that mode.  There could be other factors too like bad drivers, so my suggestion here would be to go over the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to fix this up.  You can also download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) for a few of those steps including running repairs.  I hope that helps!
